concept.title: Windshield washer fluid
concept.shortdesc: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.

metadata.data: What is windshield washer fluid used for?
How full should the windshield washer fluid be?

conbody.p: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.
